(If this post contradicts with any other posts then I apologize. My hotmail and penpal accounts are recieving mail out of order and I am unable to access the messages on the site.)

Tavatron watched in awe as Bronco galloped away. She had never seen such a thing before. The creature or how it was formed. She just crouched there, not believing what she had just seen. Iron Raptor's transmission shattered her trance-like state. She blinked her optics several times before finally opening a com to her commander:

"Aknowledged Commander."

Tavatron sheathed her staff and took one last look at the direction Bronco/octociz had gone. Things had ended better than she had originally thought. Perhaps it was just paranoia that was plagueing her senses. NOthing had gone wrong. There was no battle, and Iron Raptor was in one piece. 

Tavatron transformed and fell into step beside Iron Raptor. She breathed deeply, the air smelled like rain, but not for a couple hours at least, perhaps not even at all. She looked up at her Commander, the wind stirring up small dust clouds at her feet:

"That was... interesting."
